content: yarn knit 1 round with main color knit 8 rounds now the cast-on and live stitches are joined there are several possibilities on how to manage the stitches from the cast-on side you can use extra needles and undo the provisional cast-on first then join all stitches or you can undo one stitch at a time and join it or if you have one spare dpn you can undo some of the stitches and join then repeat until done i am describing the method where you first undo the complete provisional cast-on then join all stitches undo the provisional cast-on and put the stitches onto separate needles fold the cast-on stitches to the live stitches with the knit side facing out knit one live stitch together with one from the provisional cast-on until you all stitches are joined now you still have 56 60 64 68 72 stitches hint if you want a contrast colored cuff now is the time to cut the yarn leaving a tail and continue with your main color knit 1 round lotus heel flap with back raise i unvented this heel flap variation to avoid picking up stitches at the side of the heel flap i tweaked the technique until the fabric was very smooth like a lotus leaf hint my swps tend to get looser than the swk ones to counter work the next knit stitch with a higher gauge rearrange your stitches if needed the next 28 30 32 34 36 stitches are used for the heel place the rest onto separate needles and
